caption: Attributed to Ammi Phillips (1788–1865; born Colebrook, CT; died Curtisville, MA), Woman with Black Paisley Shawl (Mrs. Zachariah Flagler ?), ca. 1836. Oil on canvas; 81.3 x 68.6 cm, 98 × 85.5 × 2 cm (frame). Gift of Edward Duff Balken, Class of 1897 (y1958-60)
